metadata.title: CVE-2018-16421 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Several buffer overflows when handling responses from a CAC Card incac_get_serial_nr_from_CUID in libopensc/card-cac.c in OpenSC before0.19.0-rc1 could be used by attackers able to supply crafted smartcards tocause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact.

criterions.comment: opensc package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
